body.name: ComfiLife Gel Enhanced Seat Cushion – Office Chair Cushion – Non-Slip Gel & Memory Foam Coccyx Cushion for Tailbone Pain - Desk Chair Car Seat Cushion Driving - Sciatica & Back Pain Relief (Gray)
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Wednesday, February 21. Order within 1 hr 12 mins
features: Most Comfortable Gel Memory Foam Cushion On The Market - ComfiLife's all-in-one features are unrivaled: Non-slip rubber bottom, built-in handle for easy transport and machine-washable zippered velour cover for easy cleaning. The ComfiLife Coccyx Cushion is the best gel memory foam seat cushion on the market made of premium quality durable memory foam with cool off gel layer on top for superior comfort
Supports Tailbone and Relieves Pressure - Ergonomically designed seat cushion provides maximum support and comfort while reducing pressure on the coccyx / tailbone and promotes healthy posture

Provides Lower Back Pain & Sciatica Relief, Great for Office Use, Driving & Traveling - Supports recovery from lower back problems, herniated discs, tailbone injuries, sciatica and other spinal issues. Great for office, home, travel, car seat or wheelchair use. Machine-washable zippered velour cover for easy cleaning and built-in handle for easy transport

Our Customers Love ComfiLife Cushion - "I have already recommended this to all my office mates that sit all day, as well. I love it, and some advice...Lock it up after you use it, or I guarantee one of your sneaky cube mates will swipe it!" "This has saved my life as one with lower back pain due to pinched nerve roots" "I have herniated discs and sciatica for many years, this cushion allowed me to drive cross state with little to no pain"

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 1, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Really works well
reviews.reviewText: My wife has a kitchen set that has been in her family for a while. The chairs are a little low for me and the hard wood causes a nerve problem to act up if I sit too long. I tried this support and it really works well. I can sit a little higher, with very comfy support, and no irritated nerves. I don't make this claim very often but this product was worth every penny. Jim

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 4, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Comfort guaranteed ✨️👌 I had to claim it
reviews.reviewText: It was intended for the partner since he complains about back pain quite frequently, and now it is mine to possess.He says he will continue to use it when he goes to work, but after I sat on it, I told him he is to get his own because the one I got him is officially mine.Sat on it, and immediately I felt so relieved. I didn't even realize that I was uncomfortable in my seat before until I sat on the cushion. I felt less pressure on my back and I was able to sit upright but not rigidly. It was soooo comfortable that I even forgot I was sitting on it after 2 to 4 hours of driving-and I was in the passenger seat.Very soft, there will be height difference- a minor boost, but definitely a boost regardless. The instructions are clear and not difficult at all to follow. My knees were relaxed because of the accommodation and I just implore you to get it. Just get it. Don't hesitate and don't think twice. If you made it this far in the review, then this is a sign to GET COMFORT.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 7, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This seat cushion was what I needed for tailbone relief. It strikes the perfect balance between softness and support, alleviating discomfort during prolonged sitting sessions. The pricing is reasonable, making it an affordable solution. With a number of positive reviews backing its effectiveness, I was confident in my purchase decision. However, it's worth noting that the cushion could be slightly larger to fit someone with longer legs. Overall, a solid choice for those seeking relief without breaking the bank.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 10, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Superior Comfort and Tail Bone Protection While Seated
reviews.reviewText: Practice playing a lap steel guitar requires me to sit on a stool approximately 17” high with no arms. Although the stool is padded to some extent, it does not protect my tail bone from becoming painful after a few minutes of sitting. After considering similar products, I settled on the ComfiLife Gel Enhanced Seat CusThe Comfilife does not collapse under my weight, and never gets warm. Because it is non-slip, I do not have to change my position once I sit. It includes a cover which can be removed, and hand washed. It provides 100 percent protection of my tail bone and remains very comfortable throughout a complete session. I purchased it for this specific purpose and have not tried it in office, or lounge chairs.I give it five stars, with only pros and no cons, and I highly recommend the ComfiLife Gel Enhanced Seat Cushion if you need something to protect your tail bone and provide superior comfort when seated.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 6, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Comfy, durable, perfect firmness, well shaped
reviews.reviewText: Keeps in place with the grippy backing, nice material covering, sensible shape, I give up, can't think of anything negative about this seat cushion. The cushy firmness helps to keep that comfy factor.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 12, 2024
reviews.reviewText: We have narrow bucket seats in a 1977 sports car and this is a perfect fit. Great support. Solved my SI joint issues. I’m 5’4” and weigh 130lbs. This is not for a large person.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 10, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This cushion is way better than the old airplane seat cushions--better material and ergonomic design.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 5, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great for upgrading a cheap chair.
reviews.reviewText: I got a pretty cheap office chair at goodwill, not the most comfortable but I figured for $2 in my hangout cave it would do. Only issue is that after sitting for about an hour my back and rear started to get sore due to the lack of cushion. I got this cushion and over a few days it really started forming to my sitting posture and the uncomfortable feeling from the chair has now gone away. A great product if you'd rather spend a few bucks upgrading a old chair rather than spending well over $100 for a decent chair.

reviews.reviewTitle: Very comfortable, although I just got it and have tried it for only a few hours so far
reviews.reviewText: I'm looking forward to finding out just how comfortable this cushion is by using it on a regular basis. So far it feels great and fits my office chair really well.
After trying a friends’, I decided to purchase my own. It has saved my back and hips on long road trips. I highly recommend this item!!

reviews.reviewTitle: Melhor almofada para hemorroidas e doras na lombar
reviews.reviewText: Eu comprei já umas 3 ou 4 almofadas, e essa é com certeza a melhor.É mais cara que a média das outras que tem por aí, mas vale cada centavo. Melhor isso do que gastar com pomadas, massagens etc. Minhas dores já melhoraram com 1 semana de uso. Sem exagero.O material se adapta muito bem ao formato do seu corpo após alguns minutos de uso, e volta ao formato normal dela após algumas horas.Ela é superconfortável, e não é muito mole e nem muito dura. Parece um pouco aqueles travesseiros Nasa, mas um pouco mais firme.O tecido da capa protetora também é bem gostoso e macio ao toque, e não esquenta muito.Enfim, achei a melhor, e com certeza comprarei mais. Tenho 1 no escritório, e vou comprar uma para casa e uma para a minha Noiva, que também adorou.
Me llegó antes de lo esperado y en excelentes condiciones. El cojín es de gran calidad y sumamente cómodo. Lo recomiendo ampliamente.
Muy buen producto, vale lo que cuesta.Lo recomiendo
